com.anifichadia.toolkit.file.io

Class SerializableFileManager<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anifichadia.toolkit.file.io.FileManager<T>
      • com.anifichadia.toolkit.file.io.SerializableFileManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of object to read from or write to files. Must implement the Serializable interface

    public class SerializableFileManager<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends FileManager<T>
    Serializes an Object to and from a file using Java Serialization.

    Note: Reading from files is unchecked due to Java Generics
    Author:
    Aniruddh Fichadia | Email: Ani.Fichadia@gmail.com | GitHub Username: AniFichadia (http://github.com/AniFichadia)
